item.title: The Harmony of CVE's and EPSS
item.description: Cheers to better vulnerability analysis! What’s more? Finding a vulnerability or actually finding a vulnerability? It’s not easier said than done. The Exploit Prediction Scoring System (EPSS) fills the gap of having to rely on the latest and greatest Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) by using a data-driven approach in estimating the likelihood of a vulnerability being exploited. In future blog posts we will start to explore how best to leverage both CVSS scores, EPSS, and other means for more effective vulnerability and exploitability analysis.
